927880.name: The True Slime King - Soundtrack
927880.description:
The Soundtrack is a work in progress. ​When buying the soundtrack, you get access the current and future versions of the soundtrack in both MP3 (192kbps)​ and WAV format. There are currently 41 tracks totaling a bit over 1 hour 30 minutes of music. Some of the songs in the soundtrack differ slightly from the in-game songs.​ Once the Corrupt Mode DLC is made available, the soundtrack from Corrupt Mode will be included in this Soundtrack DLC.

WARNING: The songs Shadow King contains potential SPOILERS.
927880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
